item.title: Bash
item.description: script ## sum with awk awk '{sum += $2} END {print sum}' ## ls sort by file size ls -lh . --sort=size ## git git config --global https.proxy http://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global https.proxy https://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global http.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global https.proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1086 git config --global --unset http.proxy git config --global --unset https.proxy ## count lines wc -l 'find . -name "*.java*"' system ## IO iostat -xdm 1 ## CPU mpstat -P ALL lscpu | grep cpu cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor ## memory pmap <pid> cat /proc/<pid>/status ## os cat /proc/version uname -a lsb_release -a ## user useradd wuyi passwd wuyi usermod -aG sudo wuyi # add sudoers sudo visudo

item.title: Kubectl
item.description: check cgroup memory ls -l /sys/fs/cgroup/memory | grep system.slice get po sort by age kubectl get pod --sort-by=.metadata.creationTimestamp get po group by hostname kubectl get po -o wide | awk '{print $7}' | sort | uniq -c port forward kubectl port-forward svc/airflow-webserver 8080:8080 --namespace airflow
